description: This file defines data models for a mobile application related to Hindu calendars and festivals, including classes for Tithi, Festival, Vrat, Mantra, and QuizQuestion.

classes.name: TithiInfo
classes.description: Represents information about a Tithi, including its name, lunar phase, and month.

classes.name: Festival
classes.description: Represents a festival with its date, name, associated deity, and description.

classes.name: Vrat
classes.description: Represents a religious vow or fast, with an ID, name, details, and an icon.

classes.name: Mantra
classes.description: Represents a sacred chant with an ID, name, text, and associated deity.

classes.name: QuizQuestion
classes.description: Represents a quiz question with options and the index of the correct option.
